original_title: With Daniel Boone Thru the Wilderness
overview: In pre-revolutionary war days, Daniel Boone captures the white renegade Simon Gerty but lets him go. After Boone moves from North Carolina to homestead in Kentucky, Gerty reappears. This time Gerty kills the Chief's son saying it was a white man and this sends the Indians on the warpath.
title: With Daniel Boone Thru the Wilderness
